name: Ponyta
flavorText:
Its hooves are 10
times harder than
diamonds. It can trample anything
completely flat
in little time.

pokemon.name: Rapidash
pokemon.flavorText:
Very competitive,
this POKéMON will
chase anything that moves fast
in the hopes of
racing it.
